meanings.definition: A person who has a comprehensive and authoritative knowledge of or skill in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The experts in the field of medicine provided valuable insights.
meanings.sent2: She consulted with experts in architecture before designing the building.
meanings.sent3: The experts in gardening could make even a desert bloom.
meanings.sent4: His father was an expert in fishing, always reeling in the biggest catch.
meanings.sent5: The experts in astronomy could identify constellations with ease.

meanings.definition: A person who is very knowledgeable about or skillful in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The experts at the library helped her find the right book.
meanings.sent2: He became an expert in chess after years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The experts in baking could turn flour into delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: She was an expert in puzzles, solving them in record time.
meanings.sent5: The experts in painting could create masterpieces with a brush.
